Uses of Package
com.srch2.android.http.service

  • Classes in com.srch2.android.http.service used by com.srch2.android.http.service 
    Class and Description
    DeleteResponse
    Wraps the RESTful response from the SRCH2 search server upon completion of a deletion task.
    Field
    Represents an attribute of the index.
    Field.Type
    The type of the data that the field will be associated with.
    GetRecordResponse
    Wraps the RESTful response from the SRCH2 search server upon completion of a record retrieval task.
    Indexable
    Represents an index in the SRCH2 search server.
    IndexDescription
    Creates the necessary configuration for each index that will be searchable in the SRCH2 search server.
    InfoResponse
    Wraps the RESTful response from the SRCH2 search server upon completion of an information task.
    InsertResponse
    Wraps the RESTful response from the SRCH2 search server upon completion of an insertion task.
    Query
    Formulation of an advanced search.
    SearchableTerm
    The SearchableTerm encapsulates the search string with all the advanced search options.
    SearchableTerm.CompositeTerm
    The CompositeTerm that enable the boolean selection on the query terms.
    SearchResultsListener
    This interface contains the callback method for the search RESTful requests of the SRCH2 search server: upon completion of the search request, the method onNewSearchResults(int httpResponseCode, String jsonResultsLiteral, HashMap> resultRecordMap will be triggered containing the results of the search.
    StateResponseListener
    This interface contains the callback methods for the control related RESTful requests of the SRCH2 search server: upon completion of the specific request, the corresponding callback method will be called passing the corresponding subclass of RestfulResponse.
    UpdateResponse
    Wraps the RESTful response from the SRCH2 search server upon completion of an update task.
